price: Nta muntu utagira umugenzuzi (abamalayika bashinzwe kugenzura ibikorwa bya muntu).
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
